verses.name: Acts 22:22
verses.text: And they gave him audience unto this word, and then lifted up their voices, and said, Away with such a fellow from the earth: for it is not fit that he should live.

verses.name: Acts 22:23
verses.text: And as they cried out, and cast off their clothes, and threw dust into the air,

verses.name: Acts 22:24
verses.text: The chief captain commanded him to be brought into the castle, and bade that he should be examined by scourging; that he might know wherefore they cried so against him.
